mapper.insert: insert into question_reply ( reply_id, question_id, reply_lawyer_id, reply_content, system_tag, create_time, modify_time ) values ( #{replyId}, #{questionId}, #{replyLawyerId}, #{replyContent}, #{systemTag}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp() )
mapper.select:
select
from question_reply where del_flag = 0 and reply_lawyer_id = #{replyLawyerId} order by create_time DESC

SELECT
FROM question_reply WHERE del_flag=0
and system_tag = #{systemTag}
order by rand() LIMIT 3

select count(1) from question_reply
and system_tag = #{systemTag}
